front.title: Cloud Car
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. At cloud sectors, power +1, may deploy as a 'react' and may move and be targeted by weapons like a starfighter. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.
front.lore: Enclosed high altitude vehicle designed by Bespin Motors. Top speed of 1,500 kph. Repulsorlift drives and ion engines allow it to reach the upper atmosphere.

combo: Cloud Car + Power Harpoon Ground defense ability.
Cloud Car + Don't Underestimate Our Chances Deploy some Cloud Cars as 'react' to surprise you opponent.
